title: New Heroes Threat Cost Darker Blue and Harder to Read.

comments.content: Has anyone else noticed that since Hurin the Outlander Hero, all of the Heroes have a darker blue threat printing that makes the value more difficult to read? It's not that big of a deal, but it is definitely noticeable in a not so friendly way.

> Has anyone else noticed that since Hurin the Outlander Hero, all of the Heroes have a darker blue threat printing that makes the value more difficult to read? It's not that big of a deal, but it is definitely noticeable in a not so friendly way.
